long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beer Rush is a HTML5 Game. 

INTRODUCTION
Play Beer Rush on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Beer Rush extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Beer Rush icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Beer Rush popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
The goal of the game is to serve beers to the customers as they slowly advance towards the barman.
If any customers reach the end of the bar or a returning beer is not catched by the barman, the player loses a life.

CONTACT
